channel.title: Not much just need little help
channel.description: ok so if added a thing that says the writing at the top of the screen like players online etc but it just flashes on and off realy fast any 1 know how to fix plz tell me:)

just go into your weather.java and make the weather 3 and it shouldnt snow or smoke

item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

The problem might also be, when it snows and the flakes pass by, so you may have to turn the weather to 0 if you have pimpscape.

Read full topic

item.title: Not much just need little help
item.dc:creator: @xxchainxx xxchainxx
item.description:
@xxchainxx wrote:

ok here u go add this void: u add in were it says public class client extends Player implements Runnable{ hit enter twice at the end of that line and post this

//Playercount and server name at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @cya@server name here", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Owner : owners name here", 6572); sendFrame126(" @gre@Players Online: " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }
then search for public boolean process{ and after that put this in

objectcounter++; if(objectcounter >= 50 && SpawnObjects == true) { NewObjects(); objectcounter = 0; SpawnObjects = false;} if(objectcounter >= 10000) { objectcounter = 0; SpawnObjects = true;}
that should solve your problem

Read full topic
item.source: Not much just need little help
